```{r}
  library(rvest)
  library(dplyr)
  library(polite)
  library(httr2)
  library(stringr)
 
session1 <- session("")

```
Scrape for the name of the product, price, rating, review
```{r}
name1 <- session1 %>%
  html_nodes("h2") %>%
  html_text()

one1<- name1[1:50]
one1

price1 <- session1 %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-price") %>%
  html_text()

first_price1 <- str_extract(price1[1:50], "\\$[0-9.]+")
#First price
print(first_price1)

rating <- session1 %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-size-base.s-underline-text") %>%
  html_text()

three3<- rating[1:50]
three3

review <- session1 %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-icon-alt") %>%
  html_text()

four4<- review[1:50]
four4
```
